title: Pit bull friendly 2bed above bar
posting_body: 2350 w. Cullom , Chicago, IL 60618 (on western between Montrose and Irving park)
MOVE IN NOW!Big bright sunny and clean 2bed /1Bath apt with Authentic Victorian charm!

(solid wood built-in hutch, stained glass doors, Juliette Balcony and decorative fireplace)Yet modern amenities (AC, central heat, dishwasher, microwave , surrounded by windows (north, south AND west facing!)
with tons of natural sunlight on tree line street.

Master bedroom with closet is  12’x13’ , bedroom #2 is 12’x10.5 (with a hallway closet)+ 3 huge common rooms (large eat-in kitchen, huge living room and extra large formal dining room) and back porch.

This apartment is located on the 2nd floor of a walk-up building (approximately 25 stairs to your apartment front door) above the old “Celtic crown” 2am tavern (currently being remodeled and will re-open soon)
While this unit is TWO FLOORS above a bar; there is still some residual late night noise, you should be aware of.
Ideal for night owls, industry workers, musicians and artists!

GREAT VIBE, tons of creative energy just looking to co-exist well with late night fun, daytrippers and creative individuals please apply-this will rent FAST (approximately 25 stairs to your apartment front door) easy Street parking but also super close to western and Irving buses.
”western” Brown line train station is 10 min away or 4 block walk.
close to tons of bars and restaurants, located in the awesome North Center neighborhood near Lincoln Square!!
Walk to bars restaurants cafes and boutiques.
AF landlord and super cool community in the building, younger fun couples and single occupants 89 walk score87 bike score 67 transit score
bonus formal dining room (work from home office !
One year lease owner pays for trash sewer water.
tenant is responsible for gas (monthly average $85 and electric (monthly average $50) NO SECURITY DEPOSIT!
Only a $350 move-in fee /// $35 pet rent (renters insurance for dog owners) ///minimum credit score of 650 for
With 650 credit score + proof of income
